last_scene: Vane, a level 42 Shadow Stalker known as the Apex Predator, confronted Artie in Oakhaven to force a duel.
Artie refused the challenge and used the Participation Trophy's 'Center of Attention' curse to blind Vane with an aggro-flare.
Exploiting the distraction, Artie fled into the Oakhaven backstreets, successfully evading Vane without taking any damage.
key_events: Vane issued a System Duel Request to Artie, which Artie refused by fleeing.
Artie triggered a 'Critical Hit (Object Collision)' with his trophy to activate an Aggro Spike.
Vane used the [Shadow Step] skill to nearly strike Artie's neck during the pursuit.
Artie's stamina dropped to 32/38 during the high-intensity escape.
Artie successfully hid behind a heavy oak barrel in the backstreets, losing Vane's immediate pursuit.
Vane declared his obsession with 'deleting' Artie as a statistical glitch.
